Replace.Text: Provides an additional leader trait to each Ursus Student Government member
Provides an additional leader trait for Winter: "{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_SONYA_UA_A_NAME}": {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_SONYA_UA_A_DESCRIPTION}

Each government gains an additional Military policy slot, and all your cities gain +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE] All frozen and snowy tiles provide +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production, and frozen and snowy hill tiles provide an additional +1 [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE] After unlocking "Mathematics": +10% [ICON_Science] Technology for all cities; After unlocking "Printing" and "Astronomy": +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Science] for resource tiles in your territory. ]Technology; After unlocking "Electricity": +2 [ICON_Production] productivity for resource cells in the territory and provide 5 [ICON_Power] electricity to all cities[NEWLINE]After unlocking "Military Training" and "Defense Tactics": +10% [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Food] food for all cities; After unlocking "Humanism": +1 [ICON_Culture] culture for frozen soil and snowfield cells; After unlocking "Mobilization": +2 [ICON_Production] productivity for frozen soil and snowfield cells and +50% [ICON_Production] productivity for city-produced land melee units

+12 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to all units; gain [ICON_Science] and [ICON_Culture] equal to the combat strength of the killed unit by killing the unit (in standard mode) [NEWLINE] Provide a special governor: [NEWLINE] Ursus Student Autonomous Group member Zhenli (The book has its own beauty)

A special piece of furniture that belongs to the Ursus Student Activity Room.[NEWLINE]Provides +2[ICON_Science] Science, +2[ICON_Culture] Culture, +1[ICON_Food] Food, +1[ICON_Amenities] Amenities, +1[ICON_Housing] Housing, +1[ICON_Citizen] Citizen Slot[NEWLINE](Hanging student club notice board. Most of the items are insignificant and visible to everyone)

A special piece of furniture, belonging to the Ursus Student Activity Room [NEWLINE] After construction, it will give [ICON_RESOURCE_BOOK_LIST] a list of books on truth, an exclusive luxury resource [NEWLINE] providing +2 [ICON_Culture] culture, +1 [ICON_Amenities] livability, +1 [ICON_Housing] housing, +1 [ICON_Citizen] citizen slot [NEWLINE] and provide +3 book slots [NEWLINE] (a floor-to-ceiling bookshelf full of notices and slogans. In order to correct everyone's wrong habits, some popular books are placed behind the signs)

A special piece of furniture, belonging to the Ursus Student Activity Room [NEWLINE] After construction, give [ICON_RESOURCE_HONEY_PIE] Honey Pie Gift Pack, an exclusive luxury resource [NEWLINE] Provides +3 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity, +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing, +1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen Slot [NEWLINE] (A picnic stove that can be used at any time, please pay attention to safety when using it indoors. It is for Gumi's own use only, and it is strictly forbidden to borrow it)

Replaces the barracks, initially unlocked, can be built near the city center[NEWLINE]Basically provides +5[ICON_Housing] housing, +3[ICON_Food] food, each of which provides +2[ICON_Science] technology[NEWLINE]Each adjacent area, +1[ICON_Culture] culture and +1[ICON_Production] productivity; and obtains different bonuses according to the area type[NEWLINE]At the same time, cells adjacent to the Ursus student activity room gain +1[ICON_Culture] culture[NEWLINE]Each turn gives +1[ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician point[NEWLINE] (The activity room was built by five Ursus students with their wages, and a handshake is just the beginning of friendship)
Provides an additional leader trait for Zao Lu: "{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_ROSTOVA_UA_A_XP1_NAME}": {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_ROSTOVA_UA_A_XP1_DESCRIPTION}

+2 [ICON_Gold] coins to all strategic resources and luxury resources, and reduce the cost of buying buildings with coins by 25% [NEWLINE] After unlocking political philosophy, you gain an additional diplomacy slot and 5 additional [ICON_GRANT_INFLUENCE_TOKEN] influence points each turn [NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_Gold] coins and +1 [ICON_Science] technology to your international trade routes, and each specialized area at the destination provides an additional +1 [ICON_Science] technology, +2[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] +2[ICON_Food] Food, +1[ICON_Culture] Culture for your domestic trade routes, each specialized region at the destination provides an additional +1[ICON_Culture] Culture, +1[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] Reduce the cost of buying merchants by 25% and gain an additional [ICON_VIEW_TRADE] trade route after unlocking "Foreign Trade", "Guilds", "Merchantilism", "Currency", "Banking" and "Economy"

This feature will gain more effects as technology is developed.[NEWLINE]Deep into the Marrow (initial):[NEWLINE]Adds an additional +6[ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against cities, siege units, and heavy cavalry units. At the same time, all ranged units deal full damage to city walls, and there is no attack power penalty when making ranged attacks on cities.[NEWLINE]Split Shot (obtained after unlocking "Mechanics" and "Military Engineering"):[NEWLINE]Adds +3[ICON_Strength] combat strength to all units, and all ranged units can[ICON_Range] an additional attack.[NEWLINE]Avalanche Strike (obtained after unlocking "Metal Casting"):[NEWLINE]Adds an additional +6[ICON_Strength] combat strength, +1 range and +1 vision to all ranged units, and allows all ranged units to learn area control.

+2 [ICON_Gold] coins to all strategic resources and luxury resources, and reduce the cost of buying buildings with coins by 25% [NEWLINE] After unlocking political philosophy, you gain an additional diplomacy slot and 5 additional [ICON_GRANT_INFLUENCE_TOKEN] influence points each turn [NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_Gold] coins and +1 [ICON_Science] technology to your international trade routes, and each specialized area at the destination provides an additional +1 [ICON_Science] technology, +2[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] +2[ICON_Food] Food, +1[ICON_Culture] Culture for your domestic trade routes, each specialized region at the destination provides an additional +1[ICON_Culture] Culture, +1[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] Reduce the cost of buying merchants by 25% and gain an additional [ICON_VIEW_TRADE] trade route after unlocking "Foreign Trade", "Guilds", "Merchantilism", "Currency", "Banking" and "Economy"
